item.title: TextBar - Mac App
item.description: TextBar is a tiny but powerful app that lets you add any text to your MenuBar. TextBar v2 TextBar Live Monitor TextBar output from multiple machines on the web. Dynamic script control WebView menu items More details here: New for v2 Overview: Download app || Purchase “TextBar is an awesome app which solves a problem that I have been struggling with for at least three years” - MacStories.
